text: Raymond Redvers Briggs CBE (18 January 1934 - 9 August 2022) was a British writer and artist. He is known for his books for children. His books include The Snowman, Fungus the Bogeyman, When the Wind Blows and Father Christmas. ==Life and death== Briggs was born on 18 January 1934 in Wimbledon, Surrey. He died on 9 August 2022 at a hospital in Brighton, East Sussex from pneumonia at the age of 88.Snowman author Raymond Briggs dies aged 88 ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2022 deaths Category:British illustrators Category:English children's writers Category:Writers from London
